verbs.description: A federal judge [V: has] scheduled a hearing for June 15 to decide whether to revoke bail for Paul Manafort , the former chairman of President Donald Trump 's campaign . Manafort is accused of attempting to tamper with witness testimony in the Russia probe .

[ARG0: A federal judge] has [V: scheduled] [ARG1: a hearing for June 15 to decide whether to revoke bail for Paul Manafort , the former chairman of President Donald Trump 's campaign . Manafort is accused of attempting to tamper with witness testimony in the Russia probe] .

A federal judge has scheduled [ARG0: a hearing] for June 15 to [V: decide] [ARG1: whether to revoke bail for Paul Manafort , the former chairman of President Donald Trump 's campaign] . Manafort is accused of attempting to tamper with witness testimony in the Russia probe .
